protocol.name: P-G8785-1
protocol.text: Seeds were germinated on MS agar plates supplemented with 2% sucrose on a piece of nylon mesh as support. Seedlings were grown vertically for 8 days under continuous light at 22C.

protocol.name: P-G8785-10
protocol.text: Whole seedlings were sprayed with 2 uM GA4 with a fine mister, 16 h prior to the experiment. On the day of the experiment, the seedlings were resprayed with 2 uM GA4 plus 10 uM DEX and shoots were collected 2h after treatment by cutting with a razor blade.

protocol.name: P-G8785-11
protocol.text: Whole seedlings were sprayed with 2 uM GA4 with a fine mister, 16 h prior to the experiment. On the day of the experiment, the seedlings were resprayed with 2 uM GA4 plus 10 uM DEX and shoots were collected 4h after treatment by cutting with a razor blade.

protocol.name: P-G8785-2
protocol.text: Whole seedlings were sprayed with water with a fine mister and shoots were collected 1h after treatment by cutting with a razor blade.

protocol.name: P-G8785-3
protocol.text: Standard protocol from Affymetrix for One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis

protocol.name: P-G8785-4
protocol.text: Qiagen RNeasy Plant minikit was used to extract RNA from 100 mg of tissue

protocol.name: P-G8785-5
protocol.text: Whole seedlings were sprayed with 2 uM GA4 with a fine mister and shoots were collected 1h after treatment by cutting with a razor blade.

protocol.name: P-G8785-6
protocol.text: Seeds were germinated on MS agar plates supplemented with 2% sucrose on a piece of nylon mesh as support. Seedlings were grown vertically for 8 days under continuous light at 22C. On day 7, seedlings were pretreated with 2 micromolar GA4 in maximize gibberellin responses. On day 8, seedlings were sprayed with either 2 uM GA4 (mock) or a combination of 2 uM GA and 10 uM DEX. Tissue was collected after 2h and 4h.

protocol.name: P-G8785-7
protocol.text: Whole seedlings were sprayed with 2 uM GA4 with a fine mister, 16 h prior to the experiment. On the day of the experiment, the seedlings were resprayed with 2 uM GA4 and shoots were collected 2h after treatment by cutting with a razor blade.

protocol.name: P-G8785-9
protocol.text: Whole seedlings were sprayed with 2 uM GA4 with a fine mister, 16 h prior to the experiment. On the day of the experiment, the seedlings were resprayed with 2 uM GA4 and shoots were collected 4h after treatment by cutting with a razor blade.
